original_text:
And he said to the human race,
    “The fear of the Lord—that is wisdom,
    and to shun evil is understanding.”
korean_text: 또 사람에게 말씀하셨도다 보라 주를 경외함이 지혜요 악을 떠남이 명철이니라

sentences.original_text: And he said to the human race,
The fear of the Lord—that is wisdom,
and to shun evil is understanding.
